memberdef.name: MAX_POSTSIZE
memberdef.initializer: 33554432 /* arbitrary 32 MB limit for POST request sizes */

memberdef.name: MAX_REPLYSIZE
memberdef.initializer: 65536 /* arbitrary 64 KB limit for reply buffering */

this dummy function is here to satisfy nullhttpd

memberdef.name: send_header

memberdef.name: send_fileheader
